revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Team Flare Secret HQ |image = [[File:Team Flare Secret HQ.png|250px]] |caption = A map of Team Flare Secret HQ. |tokens = 675,000 |location = Geosenge Town }} '''Team Flare Secret HQ''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Kalos]]. It initially has 100 tiles arranged in a 10x10 square, including 10 chest tiles, 23 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 8,739,480 HP.
==Encounter Tables== <!--T:2-->
===Wild Encounters=== <!--T:3-->
<!--T:4--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | rowspan=10|<center> N/A || [[File:Team_Flare_Admin_(male).png|40px]] Team Flare Admin || [[File:Toxicroak.png|40px]] Toxicroak |- | [[File:Team_Flare_Grunt_(female).png|40px]] Team Flare Grunt || [[File:Liepard.png|40px]] Liepard |- | [[File:Team_Flare_Admin_(female).png|40px]] Team Flare Admin || [[File:Manectric.png|40px]] Manectric |- | [[File:Team_Flare_Grunt_(male).png|40px]] Team Flare Grunt || [[File:Mightyena.png|40px]] Mightyena |- | [[File:Team_Flare_Admin_(male).png|40px]] Team Flare Admin || [[File:Houndoom.png|40px]] Houndoom |- | [[File:Team_Flare_Grunt_(female).png|40px]] Team Flare Grunt || [[File:Scrafty.png|40px]] Scrafty |- | [[File:Team_Flare_Admin_(female).png|40px]] Team Flare Admin || [[File:Liepard.png|40px]] Liepard, [[File:Manectric.png|40px]] Manectric |- | [[File:Team_Flare_Admin_(male).png|40px]] Team Flare Admin || [[File:Mightyena.png|40px]] Mightyena, [[File:Houndoom.png|40px]] Houndoom |- | [[File:Team_Flare_Admin_(female).png|40px]] Team Flare Admin || [[File:Swalot.png|40px]] Swalot |- | [[File:Team_Flare_Admin_(male).png|40px]] Team Flare Admin || [[File:Golbat.png|40px]] Golbat |}

Base Health |- | rowspan=2|'''[[File:Xerneas.png|40px]] Xerneas*''' || rowspan=4|<center> 93,659,460 || rowspan=4|[[File:Team_Flare_Lysandre.png|40px]] Team Flare Lysandre || [[File:Mienshao.png|40px]] Mienshao || <center> 22,464,940 |- | [[File:Honchkrow.png|40px]] Honchkrow || <center> 22,564,950 |- | rowspan=2|'''[[File:Yveltal.png|40px]] Yveltal*''' || [[File:Pyroar.png|40px]] Pyroar || <center> 23,375,580 |- | [[File:Mega Gyarados.png|40px]] Mega Gyarados || <center> 27,385,730 |}
<!--T:7--> '''*Must have cleared Team Flare Secret HQ to unlock Xerneas and Yveltal'''
